forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. Southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and patchy fog before 4pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 58. Southwest wind 5 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the clock quietly ticks into the early hours of this mid-February morning, San Francisco wakes beneath a moist blanket, hinting at the rain to come. The clouds hang low, veiling the city’s iconic skyline, with glimpses of the Golden Gate Bridge obscured by a creeping fog that drapes the northern views. The air is crisp, a residual chill threading through the streets, whispering to the inhabitants to bundle up against a temperature that dips into the forties, while a gentle southwestern breeze stirs the stillness.

Daylight will struggle to shine through the persistent overcast, granting only brief interludes of partial sun. With rain poised to make an appearance along with patchy fog, expect a day painted in muted hues and softened outlines. The forecast offers a mere promise of minuscule rainfall accumulation, teasing the possibility of a sprightly drizzle, but nothing substantial to disturb the rhythm of the day. As you brace for the slight chance of dampness, layering is your ally: a warm jacket, perhaps a cozy sweater, with sturdy shoes to navigate the slick, sometimes cobbled sidewalks.

Given the moody vibe of the weather, opting for a wandering stroll along the Embarcadero might evoke that rare kind of serenity found only in misty atmospheres. Alternatively, curling up in a charming café, with a steaming mug of coffee or tea, allows for a moment of tranquil connection to the pulse of the city around you. Delight in the subdued beauty of a fog-laden San Francisco, where every corner and shadow tells a story beneath the sweeping clouds.
